alert.note: Alert for Newberry; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 4:33PM EDT until September 07 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Newberry County in central South Carolina... Northeastern Saluda County in central South Carolina... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 433 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Prosperity, or 9 miles south of Newberry, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Newberry, Prosperity, Newberry County Airport, Newberry College, Little Mountain, Pomaria, Silverstreet, Stoney Hill, Newberry County Detention Center, Fairview Fire Station, Mid-Carolina High School, Wyses Ferry, Hollywood Elementary School, and Hickory Grove. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 68 and 86. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Severe thunderstorms can produce large capsizing waves and frequent lightning. If on or near Lake Murray move away from the water and take shelter!
